Header: Tanak retains overall race lead in Finland
Content: Following a dramatic morning, the afternoon Rally of Finland stages saw Team Toyota Gazoo Racing’s Ott Tanak retain the overall race lead.The Estonian heads into the final day’s action in Finland holding a 16.4sec advantage over Citroen Total’s Esapekka Lappi.Jari-Matti Latvala, who survived hitting the same rogue rock that ended Kris Meeke’s campaign earlier in the day, had a less eventful afternoon. The Finn sits third overall.
